channel.title: Comments on: Making Windows XP Faster
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
I recall I once watched a Channel 9 ( http://channel9.msdn.com/ ) video where the creators of the registry were interviewed. They said that the registry was "misunderstood" and took the blame on themselves saying they didn't educate people as to what proper use of the registry is.
Here's an example of improper use: http://blogs.msdn.com/oldnewthing/archive/2006/02/22/536920.aspx
item.content:encoded:
I recall I once watched a Channel 9 ( http://channel9.msdn.com/ ) video where the creators of the registry were interviewed. They said that the registry was “misunderstood” and took the blame on themselves saying they didn’t educate people as to what proper use of the registry is.

Here’s an example of improper use:
http://blogs.msdn.com/oldnewthing/archive/2006/02/22/536920.aspx

item.title: By: sveta the great
item.dc:creator: sveta the great
item.description: Hey! Lets add a central database to windows and call it Registry. This is far more better than each app store all its information in a file.
item.content:encoded: Hey! Lets add a central database to windows and call it Registry. This is far more better than each app store all its information in a file.
